advisories.title: Increased Supply Chain Attack Risks in Open Source Ecosystem
advisories.description: Organizations are facing increased risks from supply chain attacks targeting open source software dependencies and build pipelines. These attacks can compromise the integrity of software distributed to end users.
advisories.impact: Successful supply chain attacks can result in widespread distribution of compromised software, affecting numerous organizations and end users. Recovery can be complex and time-consuming.
recommendations: Implement software composition analysis (SCA) tools to identify vulnerable dependencies
Use dependency pinning and verify software signatures
Monitor for security advisories affecting your dependencies
Implement secure build pipelines with integrity checks
Establish incident response procedures for supply chain compromises
